WorkItem.Description:
Hello all, i posted this issue in Discussion and im sorry for that. The problem is that if i try to optimize my warr with Scourge Stranglers equipped (leather item) then i get the answer: 'Scourge Stranglers is not available'. So i checked in Tools, Refine types of item listed and in armor i cant activate the leather option, only plate is accepted as available.
Thank you in advance for the help.
Â 
Buio

Comments.Message: Its not on by default but you should be able to select it. Unless you are using a really really old version.

Done now m8. Ty for your answer. cheers

Buio
